title: unable to connect ingame new patch..
body:

replies.body:
Just to drive home the point that there is some kind of issue, here's a couple screenshots of the post game lobby of one of my recent games (if Ikeep trying to reconnect I eventually get dumped into the postgame after it ends.)

https://gyazo.com/4cbd1ca7f52a75faff35f9290eddad5f
https://gyazo.com/4be418c0b32c99b6a8ea981a7b8c94ad

In those images, you can see that someone on the other team brought up loss forgiveness, because we had three people who were disconnected that game, and yet we were ALL in the postgame lobby.
Any RIOT answer about giving us Loss Prevented?

I'm having this same issue. It just started today. A few games will go fine, then in the middle of one, I get the "attempting to reconnect" box. It never actually does, so I have to close out an manually try to reconnect. This NEVER WORKS. Most times, I just get a black screen with the standard connection failure prompt. However, sporadically, i'll get to the loading screen, then when it gets to 100% I'll get a different "Failled to connect" message. (That one is titled "network warning or something.)

During all of this, my internet is fine. Everything else works on the same machine I'm trying to run league on, even other online games. The computer absolutely has a connection. I've tried restarting everything, shutting off my firewall, refreshing the DNS, etc, etc, etc. I have absolutely no idea what the issue could even be at this point, but now I have 10 minute waits to evens tart queues because i'm in low priority, and it's incredibly frustrating.

While you mentioned that this happened with the latest patch, is this the only game where you experienced this issue?  Or has this been occurring consistently in all your games on this account?

Reply back and let me know!
